H0.text: what jobs did robert burns have. Farmer

H1.text: what jobs did robert burns have. Exciseman

H2.text: what jobs did robert burns have. Soldier

H3.text: what jobs did robert burns have. Poet

A4.text: Ellisland Farm in Auldgirth, which he owned from 1788 to 1791, is maintained as a working farm with a museum and interpretation centre by the Friends of Ellisland Farm.

A5.text: He went on long journeys on horseback, often in harsh weather conditions as an Excise Supervisor, and was kept very busy doing reports.

A6.text: This included poets such as William Wordsworth and Robert Burns.
